description: Our 16-pack of assorted succulents will get your garden off to the perfect start. In this showcase, you'll find some of our favorite weird, wonderful, and easy-to-care-for plants. There's a variety of shapes and colors, from purple and rounded to variegated and spiky. Use them for craft projects, dot them around a rockery or repot and gift them to your friends and family!
data.title: Cutie Little Baby Succulents: 16 Pack
